about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Computer science graduate, specialized in fullstack web and mobile development
about.paragraph1: Holding a bachelor's degree, I am currently pursuing a Master's degree at Barikadimy University. I am a Fullstack Web Developer, using Vue.js for the frontend and Django for the backend.
about.paragraph2: I am also a mobile developer with Flutter. Thanks to training at DCLIC, I also have solid foundations in modeling (UML).

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Custom digital solutions to bring your projects to life, from concept to production.

webDev.title: Website Design & Development
webDev.description: Creating modern, responsive, and high-performance websites. From showcase sites to e-commerce platforms, I design complete and engaging web experiences.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Development
mobileDev.description: Cross-platform mobile app development with Flutter. Smooth, elegant, and performant apps for both iOS and Android.

desktopDev.title: Desktop Software
desktopDev.description: Building robust and intuitive desktop applications in Java and Python, tailored to your specific business needs.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building modern and interactive user interfaces with Vue.js, focusing on user experience and smooth animations.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Setting up RESTful APIs and solid backend systems with Django and Python, including MySQL and SQLite database management.

umlModeling.title: UML & Merise Modeling
umlModeling.description: Information system analysis and design with UML and Merise. Class diagrams, sequences, use cases, and more.
